mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userid, userpw, username, email, tel, birthDate, useraddress, postcode,regDate) VALUES (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birthDate}, #{useraddress}, #{postcode} ,SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE userid = #{userid} AND userpw = #{userpw}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE userid = #{userid} AND userpw = #{userpw}
